regions.name: amiibo Name
regions.description: the amiibo's name

regions.name: ability 1
regions.description: first ability

regions.name: ability 2
regions.description: second ability

regions.name: ability 3
regions.description: third ability

regions.name: Learning
regions.description: learning

regions.name: Journey
regions.description: if the amiibo is on a journey

regions.name: Alternate Skin
regions.description: skin the amiibo has

regions.name: Spirit Type
regions.description: amiibo spirit type

regions.name: Attack Stat
regions.description: attack stat of the amiibo

regions.name: Defense Stat
regions.description: defense stat of the amiibo

regions.name: Level Experience
regions.description: the amount of level exp an amiibo has

regions.name: CPU Experience
regions.description: the amount of cpu exp an amiibo has

regions.name: Near
regions.description: The near range at which the amiibo will want to be closer to the target

regions.name: Offensive
regions.description: Handles the offensive behaviors the amiibo is capable of using.

regions.name: Grounded
regions.description: Handles if the amiibo should choose to stay grounded.

regions.name: Attack Out Cliff
regions.description: Handles if the amiibo should choose to attack off the stage

regions.name: Dash
regions.description: Handles if the amiibo should choose to dash.

regions.name: Return To Cliff
regions.description: Handles if the amiibo should choose to return to ledge.

regions.name: Air Offensive
regions.description: Handles if the amiibo should choose to attack while in the air, such as when landing from high above.

regions.name: Cliffer
regions.description: Handles if the amiibo should hang from ledge when edgeguarding

regions.name: Feint Master
regions.description: Handles the overall behavior of if the amiibo should choose to counter (lucina down b for instance). Also involves amiibo “dash dancing” to bait attacks; needs more research.

regions.name: Feint Counter
regions.description: Handles if the amiibo should counter a basic attack; needs more research.

regions.name: Feint Shooter
regions.description: Handles if the amiibo should counter a projectile; needs more research.

regions.name: Grab
regions.description: Handles if the amiibo should choose to grab.

regions.name: 100 Attacker
regions.description: Handles if the amiibo should initiate a rapid jab.

regions.name: 100 Keeper
regions.description: Handles if the amiibo should continue a rapid jab.

regions.name: Attack Cancel
regions.description: Handles if the amiibo should choose to cancel its jabs, such as doing 2 jabs and stopping.

regions.name: Smash Holder
regions.description: Handles if the amiibo should choose to charge a smash attack.

regions.name: Dash Attack
regions.description: Handles if the amiibo should choose to dash attack.

regions.name: Critical Hitter
regions.description: Unknown.

regions.name: Meteor Smasher
regions.description: Handles if the amiibo should use moves that spike.

regions.name: Shield Master
regions.description: Handles the overall behavior of shielding.

regions.name: Just Shield Master
regions.description: Handles if the amiibo should choose to parry.

regions.name: Shield Grab
regions.description: Handles if the amiibo should grab out of shield.

regions.name: Item Collector
regions.description: Handles if the amiibo should choose to collect an item.

regions.name: Item Throw To Target
regions.description: Handles if the amiibo should choose to throw an item at a target.
